    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UserNodeKeywords> get(java.lang.String user)
        Get user document keywords
        参数:
        user - The user which have the document keywords cached.
        返回:
        A Map which key is the node UUID and the value is UserNodeKeywords.

      • add

        public static void add(java.lang.String user,
       java.lang.String nodeUuid,
       java.lang.String keyword)
        Add keyword to the user document cache.
        参数:
        user - user The user which will have the document keywords cached.
        nodeUuid - The node UUID which keyword need to be cache.
        keyword - The keyword to be cached.

      • remove

        public static void remove(java.lang.String user,
          java.lang.String nodeUuid,
          java.lang.String keyword)
        Remove keyword from the user document cache.
